name: Hatchling (BlitzZart)
description:
As a hatchling, you have to make the first steps towards the incredibly long journey of a turtle. Eat to get stronger and avoid your natural enemies. Tortuga is a twitch skill one button mobile game. Tortuga is available on the Google Play Store. Link to Google Play

Get the fun for free and give a buck if you want to support me and like what you got ;)
